titlestmt.titleproper: Farní úřad u Nejsvětějšího Srdce Páně Praha – Vinohrady
titlestmt.subtitle: Parish Office at the Church of the Most Sacred Heart of Our Lord in Prague-Vinohrady / NAD 1155
titlestmt.author: This archival description was created by the Jewish Museum in Prague in the framework of the cooperation between EHRI and the Yerusha project.

did.unittitle: Farní úřad u Nejsvětějšího Srdce Páně Praha – Vinohrady

origination.name: Parish Office at the Church of the Most Sacred Heart of Our Lord in Prague-Vinohrady

odd.p: Parish Office at the Church of the Most Sacred Heart of Our Lord in Prague-Vinohrady / NAD 1155

custodhist.p: The archival materials were obtained from its originator in 1960. The fonds was inventoried in 2011. 0,28 linear meters are not processed yet.

bioghist.p: The single local parish of St. Ludmila did not meet the needs of the fast-growing neighborhood of Vinohrady already at the beginning of the 20th century, so a new rectory was founded in 1910 which was dedicated to the Sacred Heart of the Lord in 1921.

scopecontent.p: The fonds contains archival material concerning mainly Prague's religious history in 1884-1950. It also includes records of baptisms of adult Jews from 1933-1942 (Inv. No. 168) and sets of rules for Jews during World War II.(Inv. No. 186)

arrangement.p: The archival materials are organized in the fonds as follows: A. Books, B. Files.

otherfindaid.p: Brátková, Z.: Farní úřad u Nejsvětějšího Srdce Páne na Vinohradech 1884-1950. Inventář, 2011, 43 s., ev. č. 522.
